OVHcloud – 2GB KVM VPS in Australia and Singapore w/ DDOS Protection for $3.35/mo!

Asia, australia, ddos protection, kvm, openstack, OVH, ovhcloud, singapore, sydney February 27, 2020 @ 4:13 am, by Jon Biloh

Chris from OVHcloud submitted an offer to Low End Box recently and we’re excited to be able to share their latest KVM (OpenStack based) offer in Sydney Australia and Singapore. As avid Low End Box readers know seeing this kind of pricing ($3.35/month) for a DDOS protected 2GB KVM VPS in Asia or Australia is a really unique deal that shouldn’t be missed. To make the deal even more compelling you can save an additional 30% by paying 12 months in advance. OVH is a global leader in hosting so you can feel comfortable shelling out money up front to secure the lowest possible price and best value.

Their WHOIS is public and we invite you to review their ToS/Legal Docs. They accept Credit Card, Debit Card and PayPal.

Singapore: Company Registration Number: 201623833W
Australia ABN: 61612612754

See the plans below and should you order please feel free to comment below and tell us of your experience!

Here’s what they had to say: 

“OVHcloud is a global provider of hyperscale cloud, which offers businesses a benchmark for value and performance in the sector. Founded in 1999, the group manages and maintains 30 datacentres in 12 sites across four continents, deploys its own global fibre optic network, and manages the entire supply chain for web hosting. Running on its own infrastructures, OVH provides simple, powerful tools for businesses, revolutionising the way that more than 1 million customers work across the globe. Respect for individuals’ right to privacy and equal access to new technologies is central to the company’s values.”

Here’s the offers: 

VPS KVM SSD #1

  • 1x vCore
  • 2 GB RAM
  • 20 GB SSD Storage
  • 1 TB Bandwidth @ 100 Mbps (traffic shaped to 10 Mbps after quota)
  • 1x IPv4
  • 1x IPv6
  • DDOS Protection Included
  • KVM Virtaulization (OpenStack Infrastructure)
  • $3.35 per month!
  • [ORDER HERE]

VPS KVM SSD #2

  • 1x vCore
  • 4 GB RAM
  • 40 GB SSD Storage
  • 1 TB Bandwidth @ 100 Mbps (traffic shaped to 10 Mbps after quota)
  • 1x IPv4
  • 1x IPv6
  • DDOS Protection Included
  • KVM Virtaulization (OpenStack Infrastructure)
  • $5.59 per month!
  • [ORDER HERE]

Snapshots and additional disk space available as paid upgrades. Debian, Ubuntu and all major distributions are available except Windows. Prepackaged CMS/distrobutions such as WordPress, OpenVPN, Joomla, Drupal and more available through the OVHcloud panel. Hosted in Asia-Pacific (Sydney or Singapore, according to user selection).

Check out their network information and more information after the break.

And don’t forget to rate the offer via our new star ranking system (top right)!

Technical knowledge is recommended as this is an unmanaged service.
Check online for the full VPS range available in Singapore and Sydney: https://www.ovh.com/asia/vps/vps-ssd.xml
Up to 2 vCores, 8 GB RAM, 80 GB SSD and 3000 GB of traffic/quota @100Mbps (speed shaped to 10Mbps if quota is exceeded)

All OVH servers are protected by powerful anti-DDoS technology which absorbs attacks and ensures that your services are always available. (15 Tbps network global capacity)

Why buy a VPS at OVHcloud?
1. Best value for price/performance in Asia-Pacific
2. A powerful and affordable upgrade from shared hosting
3. Simplified control panel + KVM
4. All inclusive-pricing, no setup fees, no lengthy commitment
5. Local sales and 24/7technical support for incident

Test the OVH network:
Datacenter: Singapore
· Test IPv4: speedtest-sgp.apac-tools.ovh
· Test IPv6: speedtest-sgp.apac-tools.ovh
· Test files : http://speedtest-syd.apac-tools.ovh/files
· Test latency : http://sgp.smokeping.ovh.net/smokeping?target=APAC
· Looking Glass: https://lg.ovh.net
· Network status: http://weathermap.ovh.net/#apac

Datacenter: Sydney, Australia
· Test IPv4: speedtest-syd.apac-tools.ovh
· Test IPv6: speedtest-syd.apac-tools.ovh
· Test files: http://speedtest-syd.apac-tools.ovh/files
· Test latency: http://syd.smokeping.ovh.net/smokeping?target=APAC
· Looking Glass: https://lg.ovh.net
· Network status: http://weathermap.ovh.net/#apac

Please let us know if you have any questions/comments and enjoy!
